com.knowgate.http.portlets

Class HelloWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.portlet.GenericPortlet
      • com.knowgate.http.portlets.HelloWorld
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.portlet.Portlet, javax.portlet.PortletConfig

    public class HelloWorld
extends javax.portlet.GenericPortlet
    Hello World Portlet Example This is a portlet designed for the home page of hipergate. It displays the current user name and surname.
